name: BazQux Reader Hide Starred Items and Tags
description: Hides Starred Items and Tags from left panel.  Increases room for a couple more feeds if you don't have a need for Starred Items and Tags.
additional_info:
Created 6/26/13
Updated 2/21/14 to fix tags from displaying
Updated 4/25/14 to fix tags from displaying (after Filters and smart streams were added)
Updated 4/26/14 - make sure you don't drag smart filters to the very top under "Latest" because it will disappear
